translation.en: MANDARIN SUBTITLES IN WHITE [ TAIWANESE SUBTITLES IN BRACKETS ]
translation.fr: SOUS-TITRES BLANCS POUR LE MANDARIN [ENTRE CROCHETS POUR LE TAÏWANAIS]

translation.en: [Pin-Jui in Mandarin] My father died when I was a year old.
translation.fr: Mon père mourut quand j'avais un an.

translation.en: My mother did her best to take care of me on her own,
translation.fr: Ma mère fit de son mieux pour s'occuper de moi toute seule,

translation.en: but after she lost her job, she couldn't afford to provide for me anymore.
translation.fr: mais après la perte de son emploi, elle ne put plus subvenir à mes besoins.

translation.en: She left me with my grandparents, who lived in the rice fields,
translation.fr: Elle me laissa avec mes grands-parents, dans les rizières,

translation.en: while she looked for work so we could be together again.
translation.fr: tandis qu'elle cherchait un travail pour qu'on puisse être à nouveau réunis.

translation.en: I missed my mother.
I felt alone without her.
translation.fr: Je me sentais seul sans elle.

translation.en: So alone that, sometimes,
I saw things because I wanted to see them.
translation.fr: je voyais ce que je voulais voir.

translation.en: [in Mandarin] Inspection.
Who lives here?
[in Mandarin] I'm going to take a look.
[in Mandarin] Come on. Let's go.
[in English] Sorry I was a little late.
I didn't even know you were in Taiwan until Bobby asked me to pick you up.
translation.fr: J'ai su que t'étais à Taïwan que quand Bobby m'a dit de te récupérer.

translation.en: How was your trip?
Fine.
[Pin-Jui in Mandarin] For a few moments, I forgot my loneliness.
translation.fr: Pendant quelques instants, j'oubliais ma solitude.

translation.en: Yuan and I spent much of the next year together.
translation.fr: Yuan et moi, on passa une grande partie de l'année ensemble.

translation.en: It was one of the happiest times of my life.
translation.fr: Ce furent les moments les plus heureux de ma vie.

translation.en: After my mother found a job and I moved back to my hometown,
translation.fr: Quand ma mère trouva un emploi et que je repartis chez moi,

translation.en: I thought I'd never see her again.
translation.fr: je pensais ne jamais la revoir.

translation.en: But then, many years later, fate intervened.
translation.fr: Mais des années plus tard, le destin intervint.

translation.en: [in Mandarin] One more dance.
I'm going outside to get some fresh air.
Maybe when I come back. Maybe.
[man] She's beautiful.
What the hell is she doing with you?
We met when we were kids, when I was living with my grandparents.
translation.fr: Je l'ai connue quand je vivais avec mes grands-parents.

translation.en: She moved here recently, and it just sort of happened.
translation.fr: Elle a déménagé ici récemment, et ça s'est fait.

translation.en: Some guys get all the luck.
translation.fr: Il y en a qui ont de la chance.

translation.en: You have a girl like that, you ask her to marry you.
translation.fr: Une fille comme ça, tu la demandes en mariage.

translation.en: Her parents would never allow it. They're well off.
translation.fr: Ses parents n'accepteraient jamais. Ils sont riches.

translation.en: I'm a poor kid from a nothing village.
[man] Better have fun with her while you can, then.
translation.fr: Amuse-toi avec elle tant que tu peux, alors.

translation.en: I guess so.
I think you'll like this one.
translation.fr: Celle-là va te plaire, je pense.

translation.en: Where'd you learn to dance?
Movies.
What movies?
American movies.
Someday, I'll go there.
I'll bring my mom.
She won't have to work anymore.
Can I come?
Of course.
Who else am I going to dance with there?
Maybe Faye Dunaway.
Never mind. Don't come.
You would only get in the way of me and Faye.
translation.fr: Tu nous gênerais, Faye et moi.

translation.en: I'm hungry. Should we get something to eat?
translation.fr: J'ai faim. On va manger un bout ?

translation.en: Let's go to Yuelu.
No way. That's too expensive.
It's fine. My treat.
I can't let you do that.
I want to take you somewhere special.
translation.fr: Je veux t'emmener dans un lieu spécial.

translation.en: We're going to Yuelu.
No more discussion.
You're the most stubborn person I've ever met.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas plus têtu que toi.

translation.en: Hello. Have you dined with us before?
translation.fr: Bonsoir. Avez-vous déjà dîné chez nous ?

translation.en: Yes. Many times.
Really? Then you've seen the menu.
translation.fr: Ah oui ? Dans ce cas, vous avez vu le menu.

translation.en: Prices are on the right.
Of course. We come here all the time.
translation.fr: Bien sûr. On est des habitués.

translation.en: I'm surprised you don't recognize us.
Fine, then. What would you like to order?
We'll start with the fried fish...
and also the bitter melon...
and a bowl of beef noodle soup.
translation.fr: et la soupe de bœuf aux vermicelles.

translation.en: Great. Thank you.
-Is that it? -That's it.
Right away.
Screw that guy.
He doesn't think we can pay? Who is he to judge us?
translation.fr: Il pense qu'on n'a pas les moyens ? Qui est-il pour nous juger ?

translation.en: Is he wrong, though?
Not really, no.
Hey. They've been rude to us all night.
translation.fr: Ils ont été impolis avec nous toute la soirée.

translation.en: Let's play a trick on them.
No. What are you talking about?
On the count of three, let's run out the door.
translation.fr: À trois, on sort en courant.

translation.en: -No, come on. -[audience applauding]
Get ready. One, two, three!
[waiter] Hey! Come back, you bastards!
You're crazy.
I want to spend the whole night with you, but I have to go home.
translation.fr: Je veux passer toute la nuit avec toi, mais je dois rentrer.

translation.en: Why don't you ever let me see your place?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu ne me laisses jamais voir ton appartement ?

translation.en: It's too fancy.
If I let you see it, you'll want me for my money,
translation.fr: Tu me voudras alors pour mon argent,

translation.en: instead of my good looks and charm.
translation.fr: et pas pour mon physique et mon charme.

translation.en: I thought you were sleeping.
Just out with some friends. Go to sleep, Ma.
translation.fr: Dehors avec des amis. Dors, maman.

translation.en: [Pin-Jui] So do you. You should rest up,
or else Old Li is going to pick on you again tomorrow.
translation.fr: ou le vieux Li t'embêtera encore demain.

translation.en: Well, we can both agree that we don't like Old Li.
translation.fr: On est d'accord sur le fait qu'on déteste le vieux Li.

translation.en: [Angela in English] You didn't do your dishes before you left.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas fait ta vaisselle.

translation.en: I can help you with them.
No, it's okay.
I'll do it later.
I'm sorry about Grandma.
Thank you.
Are you all right?
I know this is a hard time for you,
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est dur pour toi,

translation.en: but I really wish you had told me about the funeral.
translation.fr: mais j'aurais aimé savoir pour les funérailles.

translation.en: It was a small ceremony.
She was my grandmother.
You didn't really know her. You never visited.
translation.fr: Tu la connaissais mal. Tu n'es jamais venue la voir.

translation.en: The last time you were in Taiwan
was when I took you and your brother when you were kids.
translation.fr: c'était enfant avec ton frère et moi.

translation.en: That's true.
It's a long trip. Very far away.
translation.fr: C'est un long voyage. Très loin d'ici.

translation.en: And I know you're busy at work.
You never talked much about her.
What she was like.
Are you sure you don't want help with the dishes?
translation.fr: Tu veux pas d'aide pour la vaisselle ?

translation.en: -No. -It would only take me a second.
I'm fine.
Thank you for the ride.
Say hello to Eric for me.
[Pin-Jui in Mandarin] My mother and I worked in the factory every day.
translation.fr: Ma mère et moi travaillions à l'usine tous les jours.

translation.en: It was very hard work.
Sometimes, I wasn't sure if I would make it through the day.
translation.fr: Parfois, je n'étais pas sûr de passer la journée.

translation.en: [Pin-Jui] Sorry.
No.
[chuckling] No.
-Hey, I think those are my gloves. -[Minghua laughs]
translation.fr: Ce sont mes gants, je pense.

translation.en: I've got something to talk to you about. Walk with me.
translation.fr: J'ai à te parler. Viens avec moi.

translation.en: I've heard you're interested in going to America. Is that true?
translation.fr: Est-ce vrai que tu veux aller en Amérique ?

translation.en: It's okay. You can tell me.
translation.fr: C'est bon. Tu peux me le dire.

translation.en: -Yes. It's a dream of mine. -Mmm-hmm.
[Old Li] It's a good goal. Many opportunities there.
translation.fr: C'est un bon objectif, avec beaucoup d'opportunités.

translation.en: Very expensive to go, though. How will you get there?
translation.fr: Mais c'est très cher pour y aller. Comment feras-tu ?

translation.en: I don't know.
No, thank you.
I have a daughter, Zhenzhen.
We've been looking for someone dependable for her.
translation.fr: On cherche quelqu'un de fiable pour elle.

translation.en: Would you be interested in meeting her?
So, do you like going to school?
It's okay.
What do you want to do after you graduate?
I'm not sure.
Maybe become a nurse or a teacher.
Food's not bad, huh?
[Yuan] You're late.
I'm sorry.
[Yuan] Where were you?
Nowhere. I lost track of time.
translation.fr: Nulle part. J'ai pas vu le temps passer.

translation.en: And then I had to stop and pick up this.
translation.fr: Je me suis arrêté prendre ça.

translation.en: You didn't steal that, did you?
I've heard you go to restaurants and leave without paying.
translation.fr: Il paraît que tu pars des restaurants sans payer.

translation.en: I only do that when I'm with my girlfriend.
translation.fr: Je ne fais ça qu'avec ma petite amie.

translation.en: She's a bad influence!
[Pin-Jui] This is nice.
Yeah.
You know who I heard on the radio today?
translation.fr: Tu sais qui j'ai entendu à la radio aujourd'hui ?

translation.en: It's been stuck in my head all day.
translation.fr: Je l'ai eu dans la tête toute la journée.

translation.en: [Pin-Jui in Mandarin] You have a beautiful voice.
So do you.
You should be a singer.
Maybe in another life.
Where were you earlier?
I was at home.
It's not like you to be late.
translation.fr: Ça ne te ressemble pas d'être en retard.

translation.en: Were you with somebody else?
[Pin-Jui] No.
Don't be silly.
I'm just asking.
Do you want to see where I live?
translation.fr: Tu veux voir où je vis ?

translation.en: Told you it was fancy.
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit que c'était chic.

translation.en: Do you like it?
I like it.
[Angela in English] Do you like the apartment?
It's very nice.
Sure you can afford it?
Yeah.
Is this about Eric's job again?
I would just feel more comfortable
translation.fr: Ça me rassurerait de te savoir

translation.en: if you were with someone who could support you.
translation.fr: avec quelqu'un qui subvienne à tes besoins.

translation.en: Money's not the only important thing in a relationship.
translation.fr: L'argent ne fait pas tout dans un couple.

translation.en: It's very important.
You're too young.
You don't really know what's important yet.
translation.fr: Tu ne sais pas encore ce qui compte.

translation.en: And you do?
More than you.
I don't know why you think you're the one to give advice.
translation.fr: Tu te crois de bon conseil ?

translation.en: It's not like your marriage turned out perfect.
translation.fr: Ton mariage a volé en éclats.

translation.en: He's not very ambitious.
He should work harder. He's not like you.
translation.fr: Qu'il travaille plus. Il n'est pas comme toi.

translation.en: Maybe that's good.
I could use some balance in my life.
It's too soon.
We've been together for eight months.
translation.fr: On est ensemble depuis huit mois.

translation.en: That's not very long.
You don't know him well enough.
I know he's a good person.
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est quelqu'un de bien.

translation.en: He makes me happy.
You really think that's enough?
We're getting married. I don't know what else there is to say.
translation.fr: On va se marier. Que dire d'autre ?

translation.en: -Don't go so fast. Take your time. -[Minghua] [ It's fine. ]
translation.fr: - Pas si vite. Prends ton temps. - [C'est bon.]

translation.en: -[Pin-Jui] Slow down, take it easy. -[Minghua] [ Leave me alone! ]
-[exhales sharply] -Are you okay?
You've got to fix these machines! They don't stop!
translation.fr: Il faut réparer ça ! Elles ne s'arrêtent pas !

translation.en: Are you sure you're okay?
translation.fr: Tu es sûre que ça va ?

translation.en: -I'll go get a bandage. -[ I'm fine. ]
translation.fr: - Je vais te chercher un bandage. - [Ça va.]

translation.en: That job is too dangerous.
Those machines are old and broken. You shouldn't have to work there anymore.
translation.fr: Ces machines sont obsolètes. Tu ne devrais plus travailler là-bas.

translation.en: No, you don't. It's miserable there.
translation.fr: Non, pas du tout. C'est un endroit misérable.

translation.en: You complain every day.
What if I made enough money so you could retire and live somewhere else?
translation.fr: Et si je gagnais assez d'argent pour que tu arrêtes et vives ailleurs ?

translation.en: -[Pin-Jui] You can get in. -All right.
I'll send for you when I get settled.
translation.fr: Je te ferai venir quand je serai installé.

translation.en: Bye, Ma.
[in Mandarin] Hello?
[Zhenzhen] Pin-Jui?
It's Zhenzhen.
Hello.
I know it's been a long time since we've spoken.
I just talked to Angela.
She told me your mother passed away.
translation.fr: Elle m'a dit pour le décès de ta mère.

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that.
Thank you.
How are you?
I'm okay.
She lived a long life.
I know you cared about her very much.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu tenais beaucoup à elle.

translation.en: Angela said you didn't tell her about the service.
translation.fr: Angela a dit que tu ne l'as pas informée de la cérémonie religieuse.

translation.en: Why not?
She's very busy with work.
I didn't want to bother her.
She works too much. She's never at home.
translation.fr: Elle travaille trop. Elle n'est jamais à la maison.

translation.en: I'm worried.
I think she's having a hard time.
translation.fr: Je pense qu'elle vit une période difficile.

translation.en: I didn't know that.
Maybe it would help if you talked to her more.
translation.fr: Ça aiderait peut-être si tu lui parlais davantage.

translation.en: We live separate lives.
You're very hard on her.
translation.fr: Tu es très dur avec elle.

translation.en: I'm not hard on her. I only want what's best for her.
translation.fr: Non. Je veux juste le meilleur pour elle.

translation.en: That may be your intention, but it's not the way it seems to her.
translation.fr: C'est peut-être ton intention, mais ce n'est pas son ressenti.

translation.en: Think about it.
You should see her more.
She's your only daughter.
Don't cry.
Crying never solves anything.
Be strong.
[Pin-Jui] When we arrived in America, it wasn't exactly as I had pictured it.
translation.fr: À notre arrivée en Amérique, ce ne fut pas exactement comme je me l'étais imaginé.

translation.en: But I had made my choice.
There was no turning back now.
translation.fr: Plus de retour en arrière possible.

translation.en: Uh... There's a window.
Should we go out to eat to celebrate?
translation.fr: Si on sortait fêter ça autour d'un repas ?

translation.en: Okay.
We can't afford this.
It is very expensive.
This is embarrassing.
It's okay.
We don't have to eat here.
translation.fr: On n'est pas forcés de manger ici.

translation.en: Let's go.
Uh... Do you dance at all?
Um... Not really.
I get too embarrassed.
translation.fr: Ça me met trop mal à l'aise.

translation.en: Do you?
I used to. Sometimes. [chuckles softly]
Do you want to dance?
Um... No, it's okay.
[Zhenzhen] Excuse me.
Are you Taiwanese?
-Yes. Why? -Oh.
Uh, I just moved here.
I don't know anyone in the city.
Not very many Taiwanese people here.
translation.fr: Il y a peu de Taïwanais ici.

translation.en: Mostly black or Puerto Rican.
translation.fr: Surtout des noirs ou des Portoricains.

translation.en: I thought maybe you were Korean.
No. I'm from central Taiwan.
translation.fr: Non. Je viens du centre de Taïwan.

translation.en: I'm from Zhongli.
-Oh. -[Peijing] Thank God you're not Korean.
translation.fr: Dieu merci, vous n'êtes pas coréenne.

translation.en: I have Korean neighbors.
They're very loud and they cook kimchi all day long.
translation.fr: Ils sont bruyants et font du kimchi sans arrêt.

translation.en: Stinks up the whole building.
I haven't talked to anyone besides my husband in a long time.
translation.fr: Hormis mon mari, je n'ai parlé à personne depuis longtemps.

translation.en: Do you like him at least?
He's okay. He has to work a lot.
translation.fr: Ça va. Il doit beaucoup travailler.

translation.en: I get so bored in the apartment.
Nothing to do but clean and sit on the couch by myself.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien à faire, à part nettoyer et m'asseoir seule sur le canapé.

translation.en: I actually come to the laundromat with small loads just to see other people.
translation.fr: Je fais des petites tournées de linge ici rien que pour voir d'autres gens.

translation.en: That's very sad.
I know.
Come have tea with me.
translation.fr: Venez prendre le thé avec moi.

translation.en: Always good to have someone to speak Mandarin with.
translation.fr: C'est bien d'avoir quelqu'un avec qui parler mandarin.

translation.en: [Zhenzhen] Okay.
You're back.
[Zhenzhen] Yeah.
How's Peijing?
She's okay. She sprained her ankle last week.
translation.fr: Elle s'est foulé la cheville la semaine passée.

translation.en: Again? Didn't she do that a month ago?
translation.fr: Encore ? Elle se l'était foulée il y a un mois, non ?

translation.en: Yeah.
The doctor gave her a funny boot to walk around in this time.
translation.fr: Cette fois, le médecin lui a donné une drôle de botte pour marcher.

translation.en: That's too bad.
-Should I make us something to eat? -[Pin-Jui] Wait...
translation.fr: - Je nous prépare à manger ? - Attends...

translation.en: First, I want to show you something.
translation.fr: D'abord, je veux te montrer quelque chose.

translation.en: Do you like it?
I know I haven't been home very much,
translation.fr: Je sais que je n'ai pas été beaucoup là,

translation.en: and you haven't had the easiest time adjusting to America.
translation.fr: et que tu as eu du mal à t'adapter à l'Amérique.

translation.en: It's okay.
I thought maybe we could learn how to play together.
translation.fr: On pourrait apprendre à en jouer ensemble.

translation.en: Thank you.
What should I make us tonight?
Mapo tofu?
Sure.
-[Zhenzhen] I'll go make it now. -Mmm.
You know how to play already!
-I learned it just while you were out... -[chuckles softly]
[Peijing] Here. Eat some more.
[Zhenzhen] Thank you.
It's even worse since he took over the store.
translation.fr: C'est pire depuis qu'il a repris le magasin.

translation.en: He's always tired.
He never wants to go out or do anything.
translation.fr: Il ne veut jamais sortir ou autre.

translation.en: You've been married for a while.
translation.fr: Vous êtes mariés depuis un moment.

translation.en: Of course he doesn't make an effort anymore.
translation.fr: Évidemment, il ne fait plus aucun effort.

translation.en: At least he's still handsome.
translation.fr: Au moins, il est toujours beau.

translation.en: Look at this guy.
You're not winning any beauty pageants.
translation.fr: T'es pas une reine de beauté non plus.

translation.en: We don't have anything in common.
Eventually, your life together is what you'll have in common.
translation.fr: Ce que vous aurez en commun, c'est votre vie ensemble.

translation.en: Maybe. It hasn't happened yet.
translation.fr: Peut-être. On n'en est pas encore là.

translation.en: What'd you put in this meatball? It tastes like shit.
translation.fr: Qu'as-tu mis dans ces boulettes ? Ça a un goût de merde.

translation.en: Then cook it yourself. Quit your whining.
translation.fr: T'as qu'à les faire toi-même. Cesse de geindre.

translation.en: [Pin-Jui] We're ready for you.
The apartment's ready. Everything's ready.
translation.fr: L'appartement est prêt. Tout est prêt.

translation.en: I told you already.
It's not big, but it's bigger than your house.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas grand, mais plus grand que ta maison.

translation.en: You wouldn't have to do anything. You could retire, like we talked about.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais prendre ta retraite, comme on en avait discuté.

translation.en: I didn't either, but you can meet people once you're here.
translation.fr: Je ne connaissais personne non plus, mais tu feras des rencontres une fois ici.

translation.en: We talked about this before I left.
translation.fr: On en a parlé avant mon départ.

translation.en: I thought this is what you wanted.
translation.fr: C'était pas ce que tu voulais ?

translation.en: Where were you?
I went to Peijing's for dinner.
You didn't tell me.
I thought you'd be at work. I lost track of time.
translation.fr: Je te croyais au travail. Je n'ai pas vu le temps passer.

translation.en: There was no food in the house.
I'm sorry.
Peijing thinks if I go to school for just a few years,
I can get a teaching credential.
translation.fr: je peux me former à l'enseignement.

translation.en: What for?
Then maybe I could become a teacher.
Forget about it.
After we have kids, you won't have time to work anyway.
translation.fr: Avec des enfants, tu ne pourras pas travailler.

translation.en: Well, we don't have them yet.
Screw him!
Just take the classes and see what happens.
translation.fr: Suis les cours et vois ce que ça donne.

translation.en: Mmm. I think you're right.
I'll look into when they start.
Good. You won't regret it.
translation.fr: Tant mieux. Tu ne le regretteras pas.

translation.en: Let's go get ice cream.
Again? Aren't you worried you'll get fat?
translation.fr: Encore ? Tu n'as pas peur de grossir ?

translation.en: I'm already married. Who gives a shit?
translation.fr: Je suis déjà mariée. On s'en fiche.

translation.en: Do you want to pack these?
No. You can throw them out.
Okay.
-[in English] Are you done? -Yes.
Is something wrong?
You asked me to have lunch with you.
And I appreciate that.
But then, after we sat down, you just...
sat there for an hour and barely said anything.
translation.fr: Tu as à peine ouvert la bouche.

translation.en: Didn't seem like you wanted to talk.
translation.fr: Tu ne semblais pas vouloir parler.

translation.en: How you doing?
Is everything okay?
[shakily] Yeah. I'm fine.
Actually, that's not true. I'm not fine.
translation.fr: En fait, c'est faux. Je ne vais pas bien.

translation.en: Eric left me.
I don't think he's coming back.
translation.fr: Je ne pense pas qu'il reviendra.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It's been really hard.
And the worst part is...
I think it was my fault.
translation.fr: Je pense que c'est ma faute.

translation.en: Are you gonna say anything?
Sounds difficult.
What else is there to say?
I don't know.
Something.
Didn't you go through the same thing with Mom?
translation.fr: Tu as vécu la même chose avec maman, non ?

translation.en: It was different.
I wouldn't know because you never told me what happened.
translation.fr: Comment le saurais-je ? Tu ne m'as jamais raconté.

translation.en: [Pin-Jui] Would that help?
Why can't you just say something nice?
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas dire un truc gentil ?

translation.en: You could try to make me feel better.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais tenter de me réconforter.

translation.en: You could tell me that everything's gonna be okay.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais me dire que tout ira bien.

translation.en: All I ever wanted, my whole life...
translation.fr: Tout ce que j'ai toujours voulu...

translation.en: was to feel like I had someone
who cared about me, no matter what happened.
translation.fr: qu'on tenait à moi de façon inconditionnelle.

translation.en: I never got that from you.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais eu ça avec toi.

translation.en: You're my father.
I don't even know how to talk to you. I never have.
translation.fr: J'ignore comment te parler. Je n'ai jamais su.

translation.en: Maybe it's easier if we just stop trying.
translation.fr: C'est peut-être plus simple qu'on abandonne.

translation.en: Hey.
[in Mandarin] What happened to the hedges out front?
I told the gardeners they could trim them.
translation.fr: J'ai dit aux jardiniers de les tailler.

translation.en: Why did you do that?
They trimmed too much.
You weren't here. I didn't know what you wanted.
translation.fr: Tu n'étais pas là. Je ne savais pas ce que tu voulais.

translation.en: They look terrible. How could you not know?
Hey. They'll take forever to grow back now.
translation.fr: Ça va mettre des plombes à repousser.

translation.en: I don't want to be with you anymore.
translation.fr: Je ne veux plus être avec toi.

translation.en: What?
I want a divorce.
No, you don't.
Don't tell me what I want.
translation.fr: Ne me dis pas ce que je veux.

translation.en: I'm leaving.
You're acting crazy. Go to sleep.
The kids are gone.
I only stayed for them.
-This is my house. You do what I say. -I don't care about your stupid house.
translation.fr: - C'est ma maison. Tu fais ce que je dis. - Je me fiche de ta maison à la noix.

translation.en: I've made up my mind. I'm leaving.
translation.fr: J'ai pris ma décision. Je pars.

translation.en: You treat me like a servant.
translation.fr: Tu me traites comme une domestique.

translation.en: I give you everything. Nice clothes, a nice car.
translation.fr: Je te donne tout. De jolis vêtements, une belle voiture.

translation.en: I don't care about that stuff.
translation.fr: Je me fous de tout ça.

translation.en: Oh, I see.
You're spoiled by America.
That's not how we do things.
translation.fr: C'est pas comme ça qu'on procède.

translation.en: Don't forget, I was the one who brought you here.
translation.fr: C'est moi qui t'ai amenée ici.

translation.en: My dad paid for it.
translation.fr: Mon père a payé pour ça.

translation.en: You had nothing.
Yes, I came here with nothing.
translation.fr: Oui, je suis venu ici sans rien.

translation.en: And I built all of this myself, while you stayed at home.
translation.fr: Et j'ai bâti tout ça tandis que tu restais ici.

translation.en: I raised our children while you were never home.
translation.fr: J'ai élevé nos enfants, et tu n'étais jamais là.

translation.en: Where were you all those nights? Where?
translation.fr: Où passais-tu toutes ces soirées ? Où ?

translation.en: I never cheated on you.
It doesn't matter.
You take me for granted.
translation.fr: Tu ne m'as pas appréciée à ma juste valeur.

translation.en: I'm leaving.
Good! Get out. I never wanted to marry you.
translation.fr: Bien ! Sors. Je n'ai jamais voulu t'épouser.

translation.en: Go.
I used to think you could learn to care about anyone other than yourself.
translation.fr: Je croyais que tu pourrais apprendre à te soucier des autres.

translation.en: But you can't.
And you never will.
You're broken inside.
If I could travel back in time,
translation.fr: Si je pouvais remonter le temps,

translation.en: I would go back to the moment I met you
and run far away.
So far that I would never see you again.
translation.fr: Pour ne plus jamais te revoir.

translation.en: -[Pin-Jui] Yuan? -Pin-Jui?
[Pin-Jui] Yes. It's me.
Did you get taller?
[chuckles] I think you shrank, old man!
translation.fr: Je pense que c'est toi qui t'es tassé !

translation.en: [chuckles] Probably. Here, come sit.
-How was your trip in? -Not bad.
New York is amazing. Much more exciting than Maryland!
translation.fr: New York est incroyable. Bien plus vivante que le Maryland !

translation.en: Is the weather always this nice in the spring?
translation.fr: Fait-il toujours aussi beau au printemps ?

translation.en: Usually, yes.
Maybe I should spend more time here.
translation.fr: Je devrais peut-être passer plus de temps ici.

translation.en: -You definitely should. -[chuckles]
Hey, they have spicy beef noodle soup here.
translation.fr: Ils ont une soupe de bœuf aux vermicelles.

translation.en: Do you still like it?
-Should we get some? -Of course!
This is delicious.
You have such good Chinese food here.
translation.fr: Il y a d'excellents restaurants chinois ici.

translation.en: Yes. Another perk of living here.
translation.fr: Oui. Un autre avantage de la vie à New York.

translation.en: Should we run away without paying like we did at Yuelu?
translation.fr: On s'enfuit sans payer comme chez Yuelu ?

translation.en: It would be fun... but I have money to pay now.
translation.fr: Ce serait amusant, mais j'ai de quoi payer maintenant.

translation.en: You used to be so crazy.
You were crazier.
translation.fr: Tu étais plus folle que moi.

translation.en: I was just doing crazy stuff to impress you.
translation.fr: Je faisais tout ça pour t'impressionner.

translation.en: You scared me.
We were bad for each other.
translation.fr: On était mauvais l'un pour l'autre.

translation.en: I don't think so.
Can I ask you something?
translation.fr: Je peux te poser une question ?

translation.en: Of course.
The day I left, I was in the back of a car leaving town.
translation.fr: Le jour où je suis parti, j'étais à l'arrière d'un taxi

translation.en: I thought I saw you out the window. Was that you?
translation.fr: et j'ai cru te voir dehors. C'était toi ?

translation.en: Yes.
I thought it was you.
But when I looked back, you were gone.
translation.fr: Quand je me suis retourné, tu avais disparu.

translation.en: I didn't know if I was dreaming or not.
translation.fr: J'ignorais si j'avais rêvé ou pas.

translation.en: I saw you.
But I couldn't bear to watch you go, so I left.
translation.fr: Mais comme je ne supportais pas de te regarder t'en aller, je suis partie.

translation.en: It's a shame.
Can I ask you something?
translation.fr: Je peux te poser une question ?

translation.en: It's so long ago, I feel like I can finally ask.
translation.fr: Ça fait si longtemps, alors j'ose enfin la poser.

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me you were leaving?
translation.fr: Pourquoi m'avoir caché que tu partais ?

translation.en: I had to find out where you went from neighborhood gossip.
translation.fr: Je n'ai su où tu étais allé que grâce aux ragots du quartier.

translation.en: What good would it have done?
What would have changed?
I guess we'll never know.
You seem to have a good life now.
translation.fr: Tu sembles avoir une belle vie.

translation.en: It's not bad.
My husband just retired.
translation.fr: Mon mari a pris sa retraite.

translation.en: We have a lot of time on our own now.
translation.fr: On a beaucoup de temps libre.

translation.en: That's nice.
-And you? -Hmm?
How are your kids?
Good. Bobby has a band that's done very well.
translation.fr: Ils vont bien. Bobby a un groupe qui marche très bien.

translation.en: He just got back from a tour in Europe.
translation.fr: Il rentre d'une tournée en Europe.

translation.en: What about Angela?
She's having a harder time.
She works too much.
She has trouble getting along with people.
I don't know how to talk to her.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas comment lui parler.

translation.en: She's very stubborn.
You should know something about that.
Maybe before she opens up, she needs you to open up to her first.
translation.fr: Peut-être qu'avant de s'ouvrir, elle a besoin que tu t'ouvres à elle.

translation.en: It's never too late.
This was fun. Thank you for lunch.
translation.fr: C'était sympa. Merci pour ce déjeuner.

translation.en: You're welcome. It was good to see you.
translation.fr: Je t'en prie. C'était bon de te voir.

translation.en: -[Yuan] Bye. -Bye.
[in English] Hi, everybody.
I just wanted to say a little something.
translation.fr: Je voulais juste dire un petit mot.

translation.en: As you know, this hasn't been the easiest year for me,
translation.fr: Cette année n'a pas été des plus faciles pour moi.

translation.en: but it really means a lot to see all your faces again,
translation.fr: Ça me touche de vous revoir tous

translation.en: and be able to celebrate together. Thank you so much for coming.
translation.fr: et de pouvoir faire la fête ensemble. Merci de votre présence.

translation.en: Happy Chinese New Year.
[all] Happy New Year.
Do you want anything else to drink? Wine?
translation.fr: Veux-tu autre chose à boire ? Du vin ?

translation.en: No. Tea's fine.
Okay.
-Here you go. Of course. -[man] Thank you.
I'm so glad you guys could make it out here for the party.
translation.fr: Je suis ravie que vous soyez là.

translation.en: You should visit more often.
It's hard for me to miss work. My students miss me! [chuckles]
translation.fr: C'est dur de quitter le boulot. Je manque à mes étudiants !

translation.en: I substitute for her sometimes.
They love her. They think she's very funny.
translation.fr: Ils l'adorent. Ils la trouvent drôle.

translation.en: I'm sure they do. Are you guys traveling anywhere this year?
translation.fr: Je n'en doute pas. Vous partez en voyage cette année ?

translation.en: For spring break, we're gonna go to Costa Rica
translation.fr: Au printemps, on va au Costa Rica,

translation.en: and then, in the summer, we go back to Croatia.
translation.fr: puis cet été, on retourne en Croatie.

translation.en: Wow! That sounds really fun.
-Yeah. -We can't wait.
I thought you'd left.
No.
You don't have to help. I got it.
translation.fr: Pas besoin d'aider. Je m'en occupe.

translation.en: It's okay.
Thanks.
I can do the rest.
Why don't you go to the dining room? I'll make us some tea.
translation.fr: Si tu allais dans la salle à manger ? Je nous fais du thé.

translation.en: Okay.
Mom seems happy.
I'm glad for her.
This is the first time I've hosted this party by myself,
translation.fr: C'était la première fois que je recevais seule,

translation.en: without Eric.
Sometimes, I wonder if I'll ever find anyone like him again.
translation.fr: Parfois, je me demande si je retrouverai quelqu'un comme lui.

translation.en: When we were together...
it just felt different.
Do you know what I mean?
There was a woman once.
translation.fr: Il y avait une femme autrefois.

translation.en: I knew her before your mother.
translation.fr: Je l'ai connue avant ta mère.

translation.en: In Taiwan.
I didn't know that.
There are many things I never told you.
translation.fr: Il y a un tas de choses que je ne t'ai jamais dites.

translation.en: What did you do after Mom left?
translation.fr: Qu'as-tu fait après le départ de maman ?

translation.en: I went home.
[Pin-Jui in Mandarin] My father died when I was a year old.
translation.fr: Mon père mourut quand j'avais un an.

translation.en: My mother left me with my grandparents, who lived in the rice fields.
translation.fr: Ma mère me laissa avec mes grands-parents, dans les rizières.

translation.en: I worked here with my mother for several years.
translation.fr: J'ai travaillé ici avec ma mère pendant plusieurs années.

translation.en: It was hard work, but I was grateful that we were together.
translation.fr: C'était dur, mais j'étais reconnaissant qu'on soit ensemble.

translation.en: Your grandmother was a very strong woman.
translation.fr: Ta grand-mère était une femme très forte.

translation.en: Like you.
We walked home together on this path every day.
translation.fr: On empruntait ce chemin chaque jour pour rentrer à la maison.

translation.en: This was our house.
It didn't look like this the last time I was here.
translation.fr: Ça a changé depuis ma dernière venue.

translation.en: There was a bar down there.
translation.fr: Il y avait un bar là-bas.

translation.en: The girl and I used to go there to dance.
translation.fr: Cette femme et moi, on allait y danser.

translation.en: What was her name?
